languages.text: {n}Вид этого {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g} способен разбить сердце любому {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецу{/g} — машина слегка кренится на бок, вся грязная, измалеванная рисунками, на корпусе кое-где выцарапаны фривольные надписи. Нескольких клавиш не хватает, остальные покрыты пылью.{/n}

{n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вид этого {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g} способен разбить сердце любому {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецу{/g} — машина слегка кренится на бок, вся грязная, измалеванная рисунками, на корпусе кое-где выцарапаны фривольные надписи. Нескольких клавиш не хватает, остальные покрыты пылью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of this cogitator would be enough to break any Tech-Priest's heart — the machine tilts slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawls, with frivolous writings scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

{n}The sight of this cogitator would be enough to break any Tech-Priest's heart — the machine tilts slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawls, with frivolous writings scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

{n}The sight of this cogitator would be enough to break any Tech-Priest's heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

{n}The sight of this cogitator would be enough to break any Tech-Priest's heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

{n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を一目見れば、どんな{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}も心を痛めるだろう。機械はわずかに片側に傾き、不潔な上にそこら中に落書きが描かれており、ケーシングのあちこちに軽薄な文字が書き込まれている。キーもいくつか欠落していて、残りはほこりまみれだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を一目見れば、どんな{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}も心を痛めるだろう。機械はわずかに片側に傾き、不潔な上にそこら中に落書きが描かれており、ケーシングのあちこちに軽薄な文字が書き込まれている。キーもいくつか欠落していて、残りはほこりまみれだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看到这个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的状况，就足以伤透任何一位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}的心。机器微微向一侧倾斜，外壳肮脏透顶，到处都是潦草的涂鸦和轻浮的笔迹。有几个按钮不见了，其余按钮上也沾满了灰尘。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看到这个{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}的状况，就足以伤透任何一位{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}的心。机器微微向一侧倾斜，外壳肮脏透顶，到处都是潦草的涂鸦和轻浮的笔迹。有几个按钮不见了，其余按钮上也沾满了灰尘。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ver este {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} rompería el corazón de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}: la máquina está inclinada, mugrienta, cubierta de garabatos y con inscripciones frívolas grabadas por toda la carcasa. Le faltan varias teclas y las que quedan están cubiertas de una densa capa de polvo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ver este {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} rompería el corazón de cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g}: la máquina está inclinada, mugrienta, cubierta de garabatos y con inscripciones frívolas grabadas por toda la carcasa. Le faltan varias teclas y las que quedan están cubiertas de una densa capa de polvo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La simple vue de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} briserait le cœur de n'importe quel {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} : légèrement de guingois, le boîtier de la machine crasseuse est recouvert de gribouillis et d'inscriptions fantaisistes. Plusieurs touches ont disparu et les rescapées sont dissimulées par une épaisse couche de poussière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La simple vue de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} briserait le cœur de n'importe quel {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} : légèrement de guingois, le boîtier de la machine crasseuse est recouvert de gribouillis et d'inscriptions fantaisistes. Plusieurs touches ont disparu et les rescapées sont dissimulées par une épaisse couche de poussière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Anblick dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g} würde jedem {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} das Herz brechen – die Maschine steht leicht schief, ist schmutzig, voller Kritzeleien und mit frivolen Sprüchen beschmiert. Einige Tasten fehlen, der Rest ist von einer Staubschicht bedeckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anblick dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitators{/g} würde jedem {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} das Herz brechen – die Maschine steht leicht schief, ist schmutzig, voller Kritzeleien und mit frivolen Sprüchen beschmiert. Einige Tasten fehlen, der Rest ist von einer Staubschicht bedeckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarı{/g} görüp de yüreği burkulmayacak bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g} yoktur. Makine hafiften yana yatmış, çepelle dolmuş ve kasası da kargacık burgacık karalamalarla, orasına burasına kazınmış manasız yazılarla kaplanmış. Birkaç tuşu düşmüş, geri kalanının da üzeri tozla kaplı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of this {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} would be enough to break any {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g}'s heart — the machine is leaning slightly to one side, grimy, covered in scrawled drawings, with frivolous writing scratched here and there on the casing. Several keys are missing, and the rest are coated with dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}ı görüp de kalbi kırılmayacak bir {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g} yoktur. Makine hafiften yana yatmış, kirlenmiş ve kargacık burgacık karalamalarla ve orasına burasına yazılmış manasız yazılarla kaplanmış. Birkaç tuş yerinde yok ve geri kalanı da tozla kaplı.{/n}
